parameters.name: pipeline
parameters.label: Dataflow pipeline name
parameters.helpText: Name of the dataflow pipeline to run.

parameters.name: state_code
parameters.label: State code
parameters.helpText: State that the pipeline is running for.

parameters.name: ingest_instance
parameters.label: Ingest instance
parameters.helpText: Ingest instance that the pipeline is running for.

parameters.name: output
parameters.label: Test output dataset
parameters.helpText: If specified, the pipeline will write to this test dataset.

parameters.name: ingest_view_results_output
parameters.label: Test output dataset for ingest view results
parameters.helpText: If specified, the pipeline will write to this test dataset instead of the default.

parameters.name: raw_data_table_input
parameters.label: BigQuery dataset to query for raw data from states
parameters.helpText: If specified, the pipeline will query this BigQuery dataset for raw data from states.

parameters.name: reference_view_input
parameters.label: BigQuery reference view dataset to query
parameters.helpText: If specified, the pipeline will query this BigQuery reference view dataset instead of the default.

parameters.name: materialization_method
parameters.label: What method to use to materialize ingest view results.
parameters.helpText: If specified (latest or max_date), the pipeline will query BQ ingest views differently instead of the default.

parameters.name: raw_data_upper_bound_dates_json
parameters.label: A comma-separated list of raw file tags to dates to use as upper bounds for raw data.
parameters.helpText: The pipeline will use the dates specified as upper bounds for each raw data table.
